name: jupyter-js-services
description: Client APIs for the Jupyter services REST APIs

scripts.clean: rimraf docs && rimraf lib && rimraf test/build && rimraf test/coverage
scripts.example:browser: cd examples/browser && npm run update && npm run build
scripts.build:examples: npm run example:browser && npm run example:node
scripts.docs: typedoc --mode file --module commonjs --excludeNotExported --target es5 --moduleResolution node --out docs/ src
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build:test && istanbul cover --dir test/coverage _mocha -- test/build/test*.js --foo bar
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:test && cd test && python integration_test.py
scripts.test:debug: npm run build:test && mocha test/build/test*.js --foo bar --debug-brk
scripts.test: npm run build:test && mocha test/build/test*.js --foo bar

author: Project Jupyter
